FuncDef: This command creates a new split horizon group for the VPLS instance. Traffic arriving on a SAP or spoke-SDP within this split horizon group will not be copied to other SAPs or spoke-SDPs in the same split horizon group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the split horizon group to which the SDP belongs.
Defines a split horizon group as a residential split horizon group (RSHG). Doing so entails that:.

ExtraInfo: Default: A split horizon group is by default not created as a residential-group.
